title: 80 AP Liandry's!?
body:
I for one welcome our new DoT overlords

{{champion:63}} {{champion:90}} {{champion:50}} {{champion:17}} {{champion:82}}

replies.body: Space Aids has never been more dangerous. Please get tested today.
He wasn't kidding with his taunt. Bow or be consumed
AP output will be the same unless you don't buy Rabadon.
But Liandry's is going to be a much more efficient early buy, now, which makes DoT/Sustained Damage mages verrrrrrry happy.
I'm more than happy to have immobile DoT/Utility mages make their return. I miss them.
Haha I am laughing so hard at how much Swain is going to rock this upcoming patch. It's gonna be righteous.
It's not on PBE yet :|

Doesn't matter. I know his possible item paths like the back of my hand, and he will benefit immensely from the increased mana on RoA. It's gonna be a good update, even if they makes tweaks from where it is now.
Rip Swain, he's in for a world of pain if he sees any use

Maybe not. I mean, if the items make him legit op, he'll sustain nerfs just fine.

He isn't considered great now, and I still love him. Bring it on.
inb4 Malza's winrate goes up by another 10%.

> [{quoted}](name=Vistha Kai,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=9xxEhwBL,comment-id=0010,timestamp=2015-06-19T14:00:54.145+0000)
>
> inb4 Malza's winrate goes up by another 10%.

Pretty much. Inb4 malza's winrates goes to 65% and people on this board are still like:

hurr 40% winrate leblanc so broken
immobile mages are so weak xDDD
le circlejerk
True. Whenever I ask FP why he banned LB, he simply can't give ONE good reason.
I ban LB because she's frustrating to play against when she's ahead.  Even when you win the game against her, LBs can still get fed and make your life hell.
You spelled Katarina wrong.
I'm about to start taking Cleanse at all times now, just in case I see a Malz.

> [{quoted}](name=Gamer4125,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=9xxEhwBL,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2015-06-19T01:04:32.943+0000)
>
> I'm about to start taking Cleanse at all times now, just in case I see a Malz.

Cleanse doesn't remove suppression. Only Olaf, Alistar, and Gangplank (maybe a few others) can remove suppression.

Teemo is the you REALLY need to look out for.
Cleanse removes all DoT's and summoner debuffs. Cleanse won't free you from his Ult, but it'll free you from space aids.
QSS!?

Expect compensation ner...**BUFFS**

Teemo lost 0.3 AP ratio on his mushrooms (from 0.8 to 0.5) because of Liandrys.
Lol why nerf the most useless champ in lol history?
there was a challenger series game with a teemo mid, it was an absolute domination by that team.  Also his map control and level 1 cheese kills are ridiculous.
C9 vs TSM
to appease the millions of low-end players who get wrecked by 'mo
Still waiting for Riot to add a minimum damage to Liandry's DoT effect.
Yeah that would be much more efficient..
then they will have to buff the %hp damage because it will always do the minimum Kappa

{{champion:17}} {{item:3116}} {{champion:17}} {{item:3151}} {{champion:17}}{{item:3116}}  {{champion:17}} {{item:3151}} {{champion:17}} 
On Duty ~~May your god have mercy on your soul for I shall not~~

dumb question. i can't seem to find any mention of this on the pbe stuff on surrender@20. was this in a tweet or a post somewhere or is this some idea you concocted?

either way it might make the item useful
http://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/champions-gameplay-feedback/q2694bqE-513-core-ap-items-pass riot post
thanks. found it later on a different tab of sur@20
No love for {{champion:143}} {{champion:34}} {{champion:161}} or  {{champion:68}}? They get good use out of the item.

> [{quoted}](name=Asdeft,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=9xxEhwBL,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2015-06-19T00:39:33.552+0000)
>
> No love for {{champion:143}} {{champion:34}} {{champion:161}} or  {{champion:68}}? They get good use out of the item.

Vel'koz arguably less than the others (his only Sustained Damage is ult, technically the rest is Burst even if on a low cooldown with a 40% CDR build) but Anivia, Rumble and Zyra are going to be very, very happy...

> [{quoted}](name=Kuronan,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=9xxEhwBL,comment-id=00060000,timestamp=2015-06-19T12:01:18.186+0000)
>
> Vel'koz arguably less than the others (his only Sustained Damage is ult, technically the rest is Burst even if on a low cooldown with a 40% CDR build) but Anivia, Rumble and Zyra are going to be very, very happy...

He is mainly burst, but he can poke well with liandry's. I just went out on a limb to put more there ;)

> [{quoted}](name=Asdeft,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=9xxEhwBL,comment-id=000600000000,timestamp=2015-06-19T12:52:04.202+0000)
>
> He is mainly burst, but he can poke well with liandry's. I just went out on a limb to put more there ;)

Fair enough, I always did love CC Machine Vel'koz (which is gonna get Hella-Strong with this Rylai change) I'm just making the observation that he doesn't technically has any Damage over Time effects though he sure as hell has Sustained Damage in a team fight or if he's just unloading everything.
meanwhile {{champion:68}}  laughs in the background
{{champion:69}}
swain?
{{item:3070}} {{champion:32}} Won't you cry with me? I just want a hug!

You forgot the obnoxious king of Liandry's.

{{champion:68}}

Wota Liandry Rylai all buffed?
{{champion:82}} {{champion:82}} {{champion:82}} {{champion:82}} {{champion:82}} {{champion:82}} {{champion:82}}

Well, a 40% slow on AoE

{{champion:45}} I WILL RISE TO POWER ONCE AGAIN! MUHAHAHAHAAH
{{champion:68}} Rumble, the mechanized tanky flame-shitter all over you menace.
And the WotA/Spell Vamp rework! {{champion:82}}
{{champion:68}} A-hem!
Will I finally be able to  get this item to work on Cass again ;;
Thats a good buy against tanks and if you want to be a little extra tanky so yea that just became a must buy for every ap lol.

> [{quoted}](name=relevantex,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=9xxEhwBL,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-06-18T15:37:16.878+0000)
>
> I for one welcome our new DoT overlords
> 
> {{champion:63}} {{champion:90}} {{champion:50}} {{champion:17}} {{champion:82}}

The new Rylai's will be quite nice on Mord as well.
Karma will fucking love it.
Oh my God. Do they know what they have done? You already break the damage meter with dot champs as it is. Mother of God.
